Comment: LA Country ports expect to see at least a 40% drop in traffic. That is massive!
Author: AllynCrane

Comment: The slowdown in shipping is one thing, but it's looking like we're going to have a helluva time bouncing back in the future if there are massive layoffs happening this early.  It took us decades to build and fine-tune these capabilities.  The contraction of our economy and no hope for growth in sight is going to destroy a whole generation's quality of life, at a minimum.
Author: SidewaysFancyPrance

Comment: This is just the start. In May-June is when the job market is really going to start feeling the consequences of the Trump economic nonsense of the past couple of months. The stock market reacts quickly to news so that's mostly what has been grabbing the headlines. Jobs are slower to react.
Author: NuevoXAL
